meanings.definition: A series of games or matches to determine a champion or winner.
meanings.sent1: The playdowns for the championship will be held next week.
meanings.sent2: I love watching the playdowns to see who will be the ultimate winner.
meanings.sent3: The playdowns were so intense that even the audience was on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent4: The playdowns were a battlefield where only the strongest teams survived.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of the playdowns was palpable in the air.

meanings.definition: To diminish the importance or significance of something.
meanings.sent1: She tried to playdowns her mistake, but everyone noticed.
meanings.sent2: It's not right to playdowns the hard work that went into this project.
meanings.sent3: He always tries to playdowns his achievements, but we all know how talented he is.
meanings.sent4: Her words seemed to playdowns the impact of the situation, which made others uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: The boss's comments seemed to playdowns the efforts of the entire team.
